name: Switch
semantic_context: Route items depending on defined expression or rules
natural_language_description: 这是 Switch 节点。主要用于: Route items depending on defined expression or rules

mode.name: mode
mode.natural_language_description: 参数名: Mode | 作用: How data should be routed | 默认值: rules
available_options: Expression (值: expression) - Expression decides how to route data
Rules (值: rules) - Rules decide how to route data

output.name: output
output.description: The index of output to which to send data to
output.natural_language_description: 参数名: Output | 作用: The index of output to which to send data to | 默认值: 0

dataType.name: dataType
dataType.description: The type of data to route on
dataType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Data Type | 作用: The type of data to route on | 默认值: number

value1.name: value1
value1.description: The value to compare with the second one
value1.natural_language_description: 参数名: Value 1 | 作用: The value to compare with the second one

rules.name: rules
rules.natural_language_description: 参数名: Routing Rules | 默认值: {}

fallbackOutput.name: fallbackOutput
fallbackOutput.description: The output to which to route all items which do not match any of the rules
fallbackOutput.natural_language_description: 参数名: Fallback Output | 作用: The output to which to route all items which do not match any of the rules | 默认值: -1
